title: Accessibility problems
description: I need to first click on one of the "live" areas before it starts working (e.g., the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame, or the content frame).
OB: When launching the Help view on March 26, 2002, on Windows 2000, the tab key does not perform any action.
EB: When launching the Help view on March 26, 2002, on Windows 2000, pressing the tab key should navigate through the elements in the Help view.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Launch the Help view on Windows 2000.
2. Press the tab key.
3. Observe that the tab key does not navigate through the elements in the Help view.
